title: Fork and code
description: Vocaluxe is free and open source software. We're happy about every new feature that someone brings to Vocaluxe. So why don't you just start coding?

title: Translate
description: Want to help by translating Vocaluxe into your native language or by improving an existing translation?

title: Report bugs
description: Help us keep Vocaluxe stable. If you find a bug, just open an issue in our GitHub issue tracker.
